column2: house=A member of the royal house of [[Doriath]]

Elf]] of [[Doriath]], the son of [[Elmo]] and thus the nephew of King [[Thingol]] and [[Olwë]]. Little is known of him, except for the fact that he was father to [[Celeborn]], later [[Lord of Lórien]], and [[Galathil]], father of [[Nimloth of Doriath
